channel.title: Zero2auto on TheAbsnt
channel.description: Recent content in Zero2auto on TheAbsnt

item.title: Zero2Auto: Ch03-Practical Analysis Challenge (Part-III)
item.description: Welcome back.. and i hope you all are having a nice time :). In this last part of analysing challenge binary from Z2A: Ch03 (Practical Analysis). We gonna take look at mighty capabilities this binary hiding within it. So, let’s get started… Inside ‘main()’ All this stage does is display a message box and exit Conclusion gotcha guys, i was making the hype about satge03 capabilties, jokes apart this binary just shows a message box and exit.

item.title: Zero2Auto: Ch03-Practical Analysis Challenge (Part-II)
item.description: I encourage you to follow this writeup along with your analysis Stage02: Extracted from resource section of main_bin.exe Welcome back, in this part-II of analysing the challenge binary from Z2A: Ch03 (Practical Analysis) we gonna take a thorough look at the second payload extracted from .rsrc section and injected into another process of stage01 (main_bin.exe). So, let’s get started from the main of this stage.. Inside ‘main()’ first gonna grab the file path of itself using GetModuleFileNameA(), to get the executable/file name using sub_404A23 aka strtok(identified by flirt in cutter) using a loop

item.title: Zero2Auto: Ch03-Practical Analysis Challenge (Part-I)
item.description: What’s up dudes!! This post is a walktrough of challenge binary from Chapter 03: Practical Analysis from Zero2Automated: Advanced Malware Analysis course. This challenge is set to make you comfortable with malware reversing and triage by covering variety of topics like API hashing, Anti-Debugging, PEB manipulation, Process Injection, Thread Context Hijacking, Unpacking Methods, Cryptography Algorithms and so on. Base payload main_bin.exe : Stage01 In this Part-I of this series we’ll walkthrough the base binary(stage01) ie.
